__e: And now, I should like to share with you a prayer... of St Francis of Assisi:
Well, it says there, "Saint Francis hurled money from him".
Less than two years ago, the Prime Minister quoted St. Francis... and talked about bringing faith, hope and harmony to this country.
We are going to do this for you And for francis And for scotland and for France.
Even francis and I are strangers these days, So stiff with each other.
If there is any truth to these claims, Any truth whatsoever, Francis and I may not be able to save you.
